comment: The main text box containing the Chinese characters and annotations, arranged in vertical columns with a black border. It includes various forms of ancient Chinese script (such as seal script), explanations, and phonetic notations (e.g., '切', '聲'). The content appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or linguistic work, possibly related to the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The right margin contains small printed text: '小徐本三 言文十二 二十三 李云', likely indicating edition, section, page, and annotator.
